scripts.mq:ensure: docker start rabbitmq || docker run --name rabbitmq -d -p 5672:5672 -p 15672:15672 rabbitmq:3-management
scripts.dev:api:rabbit: cross-env NODE_ENV=production QUEUE_BACKEND=rabbitmq RABBITMQ_URL=amqp://admin:admin123@localhost:5672 wait-on tcp:5672 && node --watch src/app.js
scripts.dev:worker:rabbit: cross-env NODE_ENV=production QUEUE_BACKEND=rabbitmq RABBITMQ_URL=amqp://admin:admin123@localhost:5672 wait-on tcp:5672 && node src/workers/video.queue.worker.js
scripts.dev:all: npm run mq:ensure && concurrently -n API,WORKER -c green,magenta "npm:dev:api:rabbit" "npm:dev:worker:rabbit"
